mapper.insert: insert into tb_platform_helper (helpid, appline, title, context, ouid, addtime, upduid, updtime, status, summary) values (#{helpid},#{appline},#{title},#{context},#{uid}, #{time},#{uid},#{time},#{status},#{summary});

insert into tb_open_api_type(otid, cname, potid, idx, ouid, addtime, upduid, updtime, status, summary) values (#{otid},#{cname},#{potid},
#{idx},
(select count(1) +1 from tb_open_api_type where potid = #{potid} and status = '1'),
#{uid}, #{time},#{uid},#{time},#{status},#{summary});

insert into tb_open_api_list (otid, apiid, cname, idx, apidesc, reqtype, curl, descfile, apibody,ouid, addtime, upduid, updtime, status, summary) values (#{otid},#{apiid},#{cname},
#{idx},
(select count(1)+1 from tb_open_api_list where status ='1' and otid = #{otid}),
#{apidesc}, #{reqtype},#{curl},#{descfile},#{apibody},#{uid}, #{time},#{uid},#{time},#{status},#{summary});
mapper.select:
select COALESCE( string_agg ( DISTINCT cid, ',' ), '' ) AS cids, COALESCE ( string_agg ( DISTINCT manager, ',' ), '' ) AS uids FROM tb_platform_org WHERE status = '1'
and manager in ( SELECT regexp_split_to_table( #{uids},',' ) )

SELECT cid,manager FROM tb_platform_org WHERE status = '1'
and cid = #{cid}
select otid,cname,potid from tb_open_api_type where status ='1';
